front.title: Light Repeating Blaster Rifle
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your warrior. If your power droid or fusion generator present, may target a character, creature or vehicle using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +1 > defense value. May fire repeatedly for 2 Force each time.
front.lore: BlasTech model T-21 light repeating blaster. Excellent power, good range. Carries energy for 25 shots. Unlimited firepower when attached to a power generator.

canceledBy: Game text canceled by Mandalorian Mishap
